```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(leaflet)
library(shiny)
```

```{r}
ui = fluidPage(
    titlePanel("Air Quality Metrics in New York"),

    sidebarLayout(
        sidebarPanel(
            selectInput("metric", "Choose Air Pollutant:",
                        choices = c("Nitrogen Dioxide", "Ozone", "PM2.5"))
        ),

        mainPanel(
            leafletOutput("map")
        )
    )
)


server = function(input, output) {
    
    output$map <- renderLeaflet({

        data <- your_data |> 
            dplyr::select(lat, long, input$metric)


        leaflet(data) |> 
            addTiles() |> 
            addCircles(lat = ~lat, lng = ~long, weight = 1,
                       radius = ~getRadius(input$metric),
                       color = ~getColor(input$metric))
    })
}

shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)
```
